title_en: Hulls of Free Linear Codes over a Non-Unital Ring
title_zh: 非幺环上自由线性码的核
summary_en: This paper investigates the hull codes of free linear codes over a non-unital ring $ E= \langle κ,τ\mid 2 κ=2 τ=0,~ κ^2=κ,~ τ^2=τ,~ κτ=κ,~ τκ=τ\rangle$. Initially, we examine the residue and torsion codes of various hulls of $E$-linear codes and obtain an explicit form of the generator matrix of the hull of a free $E$-linear code. Then, we propose four build-up construction methods to construct codes with a larger length and hull-rank from codes with a smaller length and hull-rank. Some illustrative examples are also given to support our build-up construction methods. Subsequently, we study the permutation equivalence of two free $E$-linear codes and discuss the hull-variation problem. As an application, we classify optimal free $E$-linear codes for lengths up to $8$.
summary_zh: 本文研究了非幺环 $E= \langle κ,τ\mid 2 κ=2 τ=0,~ κ^2=κ,~ τ^2=τ,~ κτ=κ,~ τκ=τ\rangle$ 上自由线性码的核码。首先，我们考察了 $E$-线性码各类核的剩余码与挠码，并得到了自由 $E$-线性码之核的生成矩阵的显式形式。随后，我们提出了四种递升构造方法，能够从长度与核秩较小的码构造出长度与核秩更大的码。文中也给出了一些示例以佐证我们的递升构造方法。接着，我们研究了两个自由 $E$-线性码的置换等价性问题，并探讨了核的变异问题。作为应用，我们对长度不超过 $8$ 的最优自由 $E$-线性码进行了分类。
